db:info.db:title: Qt Network Authorization
db:info.db:edition: Qt Network Authorization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:article.db:para: Qt Network Authorization provides a set of APIs that enable Qt applications to obtain limited access to online accounts and HTTP services without exposing users' passwords.
Currently, the supported authorization protocol is OAuth, versions 1 and 2.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS NetworkAuth) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::NetworkAuth)
db:section.db:para: See also the Build with CMake overview.

db:section.db:title: Overview
db:section.db:para: The goal of this module is to provide a way to handle different authentication methods present on the Internet.

These systems allow the application developers to create applications which use external authentication servers provided by an Authorization Server.
